definition: Fuyuan county in Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang
to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
Fuyuan county in Kiamusze or Jiamusi city 佳木斯[Jia1 mu4 si1], Heilongjiang
Bolshoi Ussuriisk Island in the Heilongjiang or Amur river, at mouth of the Ussuri River opposite Khabarovsk/same as Heixiazi Island 黑瞎子島|黑瞎子岛

sentences.english: Their destination is the gleaming Chinese town of Fuyuan, reached by whizzy hydrofoil.
sentences.chinese: 他們的目的地是美麗的中國小城撫遠。

sentences.english: A decade ago Fuyuan was little more than a village with a few pigs.
sentences.chinese: 10年前，撫遠不過是一個僅有幾頭豬的小村子。

sentences.english: Local Russians can travel to Fuyuan without a visa.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯人來撫遠旅遊，並不需要辦理簽證。
